creditline: Gift of funds from Wheaton Wood, by exchange
description: small screen from Prindle House, glass and cypress wood, American XXc. NO PHOTO ON CAT. CARDS; cat. card dims H. 11-5/8\' x W. 26-3/4\'  Two panels are tinted photographic images on glass (one missing); glass panel stroed in D9.5 MS
title: Three panel folding screen from Prindle house
